jlyrics
Class LyricsFeatureProcessor

java.lang.Object
  jlyrics.LyricsFeatureProcessor

public class LyricsFeatureProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

A library of static methods that can be used to extract features from text files containing lyrics.

Constructor Summary
LyricsFeatureProcessor()

LyricsFeatureProcessor

public LyricsFeatureProcessor()
Method Detail

verifyCanSave

public static void verifyCanSave(java.lang.String file_path,
                                 boolean permit_overwrite)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Throws an exception if a file cannot be written to the specified file path. Possible causes could be that no path is specified or a file already exists at that path.

Parameters:
file_path - The file path to check.
permit_overwrite - Whether or not existing files at the given path may be overwritten.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - An informative exception is thrown if the specified path cannot be written to.

parseSongLyrics

public static SongLyrics[] parseSongLyrics(java.lang.String directory_path)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Searches through the specified directory and its sub-directories in order to find all files with the ".txt" extension. All of these files are then parsed into SongLyrics objects. Files with other extensions are ignored. Each SongLyrics object is given an identifier equal to its filename (not its path).

Parameters:
directory_path - The directory to search for files to extract lyrics from.
Returns:
One SongLyrics object for each lyrics file found.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an informative exception if a problem occurs during parsing or if no appropriate lyrics files could be found.

populateFeatureExtractorsToApply

public static LyricsFeatureExtractor[] populateFeatureExtractorsToApply()
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Return the set of features to extract from lyrics data.

Returns:
The feature extractors to apply to lyrics data.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an informative Exception if a problem occurs.

findOrderedFeatureExtractors

public static LyricsFeatureExtractor[] findOrderedFeatureExtractors(LyricsFeatureExtractor[] unordered_feature_extractors)
Returns an array containing the same feature extractors as those provided, but reordered such that all features that require other features to be extracted will be extracted after those features.

Parameters:
unordered_feature_extractors - The unordered feature extractors to order. This is not changed during processing.
Returns:
The properly ordered feature extractors. The feature extractors that appear first should be extracted frist.

findFeatureExtractorDependencies

public static int[][] findFeatureExtractorDependencies(LyricsFeatureExtractor[] feature_extractors)
Goes through the given array of feature extractors and determines which features are dependent on which other features in terms of the indices of this given feature_extractors array.

Parameters:
feature_extractors - The feature extractors to extract dependencies from.
Returns:
The dependencies of the features in the given feature_extractors. The first indice corresponds to the feature_extractors indice and the second identifies the number of the dependent feature. The entry identifies the indice of the feature in feature_extractors that corresponds to a dependant feature. The first dimension is set to null if there are no dependent features.

extractFeatures

public static double[][][] extractFeatures(SongLyrics[] song_lyrics,
                                           LyricsFeatureExtractor[] features_to_extract)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Extract all of the specified features from all of the specified songs.

Parameters:
song_lyrics - The lyrics from which to extract features.
features_to_extract - The particular features to extract. They will be extracted in the order in which they appear.
Returns:
The extracted feature values. The first indice identifies the song, the second identifies the feature and the third identifies the feature value. The third dimension will be null if the given feature could not be extracted for the given window.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

prepareFeatureValues

public static ace.datatypes.DataSet[] prepareFeatureValues(SongLyrics[] song_lyrics,
                                                           LyricsFeatureExtractor[] features_extracted,
                                                           double[][][] feature_values)
Return ACE DataSet objects for all of the extracted features.

Parameters:
song_lyrics - The songs from which features were extracted.
features_extracted - The features that were extracted.
feature_values - The extracted feature values. The first indice identifies the song, the second identifies the feature and the third identifies the feature value. The third dimension will be null if the given feature could not be extracted for the given window.
Returns:
DataSet objects representing the extracted features.

prepareFeatureDescriptions

public static ace.datatypes.FeatureDefinition[] prepareFeatureDescriptions(LyricsFeatureExtractor[] features)
Return ACE FeatureDefinition objects for each of the features to be extracted.

Parameters:
features - The features to be extracted.
Returns:
FeatureDefinitions for the features.
